name: VisaInfo
0:
”Alexa, open visa info”
”Alexa, ask visa info if Americans need visa to go to France”
”Alexa, ask visa info if I need visa to go to Switzerland I am an Indian citizen”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: visa info
des:
Planning an overseas trip? Visa Info skill can help you find out if you need a visa for your international travel. You have to provide your citizenship and the destination country where you are traveling. 

For example: Do American citizens need visa to go to France?

Currently the skill can handle visa information requests for American , Indian and Chinese citizens. 

Source: Wikipedia

DISCLAIMER : This skill is for informational purpose only. It will let you know if you need visa or not / visa on arrival to visit the country. Check the destination country's embassy for detail requirements.
